channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Luke Combs’ Son Gets a Dale Earnhardt Sr.-Inspired Racing Birthday Party: ‘Guess Who Picked the Theme?’
item.description: Revving up for an epic birthday bash 🏁🚗 Luke Combs' son goes full speed with a Dale Earnhardt Sr. theme! 🎉 #BirthdayGoals

item.title: New Kids on the Block Bring the ‘Right Stuff’ to Las Vegas Residency: Exclusive Tour Stop | All Access | Billboard News
item.description: 🎉 Vegas, get ready to party with New Kids on the Block! 🕺 Exclusive tour stop announcement from @billboard! #NKOTB #VegasBaby 🌟

item.title: Coldplay’s “Sparks” Enters Hot 100 for First Time After Viral TikTok About Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson’s Breakup
item.description: 🔥 Coldplay's "Sparks" ignites the Hot 100 after TikTok buzz about Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson's split! 🎶 #Coldplay #MusicNews

item.title: Blue’s Clues Star Steve Burns Launching New Podcast for Adults
item.description: 🎧 Get ready to tune in with Blue's Clues star Steve Burns on his new podcast for adults! 🌟 #PodcastAlert #SteveBurnsJams

item.title: Good Charlotte announce first album in 7 years, share “Rejects”
